TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ToolStripManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制 的呈现和漂浮，以及 、 和 对象的合并。

span.span: Controls rendering and rafting, and the merging of , , and objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持-相关的任务对于整个应用程序，如合并、 设置和呈现器的选项。 supports -related tasks for entire applications, such as merging, settings, and renderer options. 重载方法结合在一起控件与彼此，和重载方法撤消合并操作。The overloaded method combines controls with each other, and the overloaded method undoes a merge operation. 使用类，该类具有类，以获得更多控制和自定义于绘画和布局样式。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over painting and layout style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的菜单项合并所有典型的方案。The following code example demonstrates all the typical scenarios of menu item merging. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示调用和其部分成员。The following code example demonstrates a call to and some of its members. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的快捷键是通过单独; F12 函数 F1 键使用 CTRL、 alt 键或 SHIFT 的修饰符; 的功能键或 CTRL、 alt 键或 SHIFT 修饰符与其他密钥。Valid shortcut keys are the function keys F1 through F12 alone; function keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers; or other keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers. CTRL、 ALT，键或 SHIFT 键和函数键以外的键不是有效的快捷键如果单独使用。CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT keys and keys other than function keys are not valid shortcut keys if used alone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不在设计窗体的控件时间会在保存设置会从时加载这些设置。 controls that are not on the form at design time when the settings are saved are removed from the when the settings are loaded. 重置的设置，注释掉行并保留行。To reset the settings, comment out the line and leave the line. 这不会加载任何设置，会继续保留的最后一个状态。This will not load any settings and will persist the last state. 删除从注释时行，将应用这些设置。When you remove the comment from the line, those settings will be applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，将合并的相同对象类型，如对象与其他对象，对象与其他对象，依次类推。Use the method to combine objects of identical type, such as objects with other objects, objects with other objects, and so on. 使用方法，将合并不同类型的对象。Use the method to combine objects of different types. 属性必须设置为`true`两个对象和源和目标类型必须相同，或此方法返回`false`。The property must be set to `true` for both objects, and the source and target types must be identical, or this method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果有两个上设置的 MDI 子窗体的控件到`true`父窗体将只有其中一个的内容合并控件。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 使用其他子的内容合并MDI 父窗体上的控件。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form.

span.span: The or parameter is .

exception.span: 或 参数引用同一个 。

span.span: The or parameters refer to the same .

span.span: if the merge is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，将合并不同类型的对象。Use the method to combine objects of different types. 使用方法，将合并的相同对象类型，如对象与其他对象，对象与其他对象，依次类推。Use the method to combine objects of identical type, such as objects with other objects, objects with other objects, and so on. 属性必须设置为`true`两个对象，否则此方法将返回`false`。The property must be set to `true` for both objects, or this method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果有两个上设置的 MDI 子窗体的控件到`true`父窗体将只有其中一个的内容合并控件。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 使用其他子的内容合并MDI 父窗体上的控件。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将合并菜单项基于指定的选择。The following code example merges menu items based on specified choices. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!CAUTION] > 若要防止内存泄漏，禁用释放你的应用程序时此事件。To prevent memory leaks, disable this event when your application is disposed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripManager1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
